title: Korean client
body: i had recently seen a video showing me how to get korean font voiice actors ect. on my na acc. It said you go in to the riot game folder then RADS then lacale and change it into locale and change it to ko_KR and it lets u get the korean client. WILL THIS GET ME BAN?

replies.body:
Changing your locale to get other voice or fonts is not something we generally ban for. I can't recommend doing it, as it's *technically* modifying your game files, but if you choose to do so, you do it **at your own risk**. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
